overview: LGBT people have made a lot of advancements towards our imminent acceptance into society and one of the most surprising fronts has been the high school prom. With all the recent news of gays getting banned from or allowed to go to various proms, there has got to be some serious sex going on. We're here to give you a taste of what it's like. These barely legal boys play out their prom fantasies which all end in hardcore fucking action with some of the best cream-pies and facials you've ever seen. Don't miss out on all the action as Kyler Moss, Conner Bradley, Aiden Summers, Kyler Ash, and more fuck each other silly and make a night for themselves that they'll never forget.
title: BoyCrush Prom
